synopsis.text:
Welcome to a world where art transcends the canvas and reaches out to all senses, a world transformed by the advent of 'Perception Art' over the past decade. Born to the pioneers of this revolutionary art form, Kazuya Yamanashi, alongside his childhood friend Jun Tsuzuki, embarks on a journey to become a Perception Artist at the esteemed Eisen High School. But Kazuya's ambitions extend beyond artistic pursuits; he yearns to rekindle a friendship lost to time and an unspoken incident.

Kyou Takise, another prodigy in the realm of Perception Art, is a childhood friend turned stranger. His father, a renowned 'grader' in the field, has left an indelible mark on Kyou's life, as have the scars from a shared past with Kazuya and Jun. As they navigate the colorful and immersive world of Perception Art, will these young artists find the hues to paint over the past and reconnect? Join them on their journey of self-discovery, friendship, and artistic expression in this vibrant anime.
